remarks.para: One may be inoperative off provided associated IDG is disconnected.

numlitem.para: Verify APU generator is powering the busses of the inoperative generator.
Verify both Bus Tie Switches are in the AUTO position and the amber BUS OFF, APU GEN OFF, and UTILITY BUS OFF lights are not illuminated.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.
Reduce Takeoff Climb Limit Weight by 500 lbs.
Reduce Landing Climb Limit Weight by 700 lbs.
Reduce Method 1 or 2 Terrain Clearance Weight by 1,500 lbs.
Add 370 lbs/hour MEL fuel usage for APU operation.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

placard.para: Placard affected L (R) GEN CONT switch "INOP - IDG DISCONNECTED" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Check and service operative Engine Driven Generator (IDG) oil quantity.
